remarks: Positive reals are multiplicatively located.  Lemma 12.8 of [BauerTaylor], p. 56.  (Contributed by Jim Kingdon, 8-Dec-2019.)
statement:
prmuloc $p |- ( ( <. L , U >. e. P. /\ A <Q B ) -> E. d e. Q. E. u e. Q. ( d e. L /\ u e. U /\ ( u .Q A ) <Q ( d .Q B ) ) ) $.
$d A d u $.
$d B d u $.
$d L d u $.
$d U d u $.
